name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open haiku reader”
”ask haiku reader to read me a poem”
”tell Haiku Reader to read me a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: "Haiku" is a traditional form of Japenese poetry that consists of three lines. The first and last line has five syllables and the middle has seven syllables. Haiku Reader gives you fun and interesting poems to lift your spirits.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
